description.value: Your spell disorients your targets with a metallic clangor. If the next action you use this turn is to Cast a non-cantrip Spell that deals damage in an area (such as a burst, line, or cone), the spell deals an additional @Damage[1d8[sonic]] damage and all creatures who fail their save against the spell are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 round. Targets who critically fail their saves against this spell are instead deafened for 1 minute. The spell gains the sonic trait.

value.value: metal is in your elemental philosophy
